Package DictionaryTypes.TrieStructureComponents

Class State

java.lang.Object
DictionaryTypes.TrieStructureComponents.State
public class State
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to store states to traverse the trie data structure

    • addLink

      public void addLink​(State s, java.lang.Character ch)
      Method to add a new state and a new edge. It calls a method to determine whether the current word exists. A new state is created and edge added if existing state not found.
      Parameters:
      s - takes in a state
      ch - takes in a character

    • compareOutgoingEdges

      public State compareOutgoingEdges​(int NN, char ch, java.lang.String CurrentWordUpUntil)
      Takes in word and returns existing state. A word is taken in and an existing state containing that word is searched for. If the state is found, the state is returned
      Parameters:
      NN - compares the position of a character in a word
      ch - the current character of an edge
      CurrentWordUpUntil - is the current word

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Override toString Returns current word
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • test

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> test()
      This method return an arraylist of outgoing words from all states

    • testing

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> testing()
      This method return an arraylist of characters from all states
